message.body: Hey, I'm sorry for missing tonight. I came home and faceplanted hard.
Late-happy birthday though! I'll treat you to something next time we're out.
Thanks, John! Don't worry about it. The burger place would have only left you with one option anyway, so I didn't think it would be fair. See you next time.
Hey John. So tomorrow there's this communication workshop thing. It's about helping community members and a big thing is how to network and meet people.
A client of my mom's wanted me and Michael to go. She has an RN and a computer guy to introduce us to that may help with jobs. Would you want to come? It
No pressure. We both don't really feel like going, but someone there might know of someone who could be of some use.
